sentences.english: Wanquan River is the mother river of Hainan.
sentences.chinese: 萬泉河是海南的母欽河。

sentences.english: Nearby, the clear Wanquan River empties itself into the boundless Pacific Ocean.
sentences.chinese: 不遠處，清清萬泉河水流入浩瀚的太平洋。

sentences.english: River is located in the eastern part of Hainan Island Hainan Province, China.
sentences.chinese: 萬泉河位於中國海南省海南島東部。
